resources.string: Have You Visited This Doctor Before?

About Us - Patient


 DoctFin helps you find and book appointments with doctors and clinics in your city. DoctFin lists many verified doctors and clinic profiles, so you have the widest range of options while making a choice. 

SEARCH - Find and book


- Search and book appointments with doctors based on area, availability, date , specific speciality and reason. 
- View list of doctors based on search details and get their actual location through map. 
- Book an appointment with the doctor of your choice by supplying date time and reason of appointment.


MEDICAL TEAM


- DoctFin lists many verified doctors and clinic profiles, so you have the widest range of options while making a choice.


APPOINTMENTS


- Filtering of appointments based on Today/Future/Past date. 
- Can delete the appointment on wish and can set reminder providing notification prompting with date, time and message.


You can find doctors on DoctFin: 
- Dental Care 
- Skin Care 
- Neural Health 
- Ear Nose Throat Care

DoctFin helps you find and book appointments with doctors and clinics in your city. DoctFin lists many verified doctors and clinic profiles, so you have the widest range of options while making a choice.

- Search and book appointments with doctors based on area, availability, date , specific speciality and reason. \n- View list of doctors based on search details and get their actual location through map. \n- Book an appointment with the doctor of your choice by supplying date time and reason of appointment.
- DoctFin lists many verified doctors and clinic profiles, so you have the widest range of options while making a choice.
- Filtering of appointments based on Today/Future/Past date. \n- Can delete the appointment on wish and can set reminder providing notification prompting with date, time and message.\n

GENERAL
 By installing the Application (as defined below), you agree to be bound by these terms of use (“appterms”). Please review them carefully before installation and/or acceptance.


DATA PROTECTION Any personal information you supply to DoctFin when using the Application will be used by DoctFin in accordance with its Privacy Policy.


SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS


a) In order to use the Application, you are required to have a compatible mobile telephone or handheld device, internet access, and the necessary minimum specifications.
b) The Software Requirements are as follows: Mac OS devices ; Language: English.


AVAILABILITY


Application is provided over the internet and mobile networks and so the quality and availability of the Application may be affected .
By installing the Application (as defined below), you agree to be bound by these terms of use (“appterms”). Please review them carefully before installation and/or acceptance.
Any personal information you supply to DoctFin when using the Application will be used by DoctFin in accordance with its Privacy Policy.
